       function search_validate() {
         var p_form = document.forms['frmSearch'];

         if (p_form['GO_TO_LOT_NUMBER'].checked) {
         	a_fields[a_fields.length] = new Array("ITEM_DESC", "Lot Number", 4, "text_int", 0, 0, 0);
         }
         else
 			a_fields[a_fields.length] = new Array("ITEM_DESC", "Search Query", 2147483647, "text_string", 0, 0, 0);
 
         return commonvalidate(a_fields, p_form);
     }

      <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
       function load() {
     	var elm = document.getElementById("uEl");
     	if (elm) {
     		var padding;
     		if (document.defaultView) {
     			var st = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(elm, null);
     			padding = parseInt(st.paddingBottom) + parseInt(st.paddingTop);
     		}
     		else if (elm.currentStyle) {
     			padding = parseInt(elm.currentStyle["paddingBottom"]) + parseInt(elm.currentStyle["paddingTop"]);
     		}
     		else
     			return;
     		var height = document.getElementById("uEl").clientHeight;
     		if (height < document.getElementById("uPr").offsetHeight)
     			height = document.getElementById("uPr").offsetHeight;
     		if (height < document.getElementById("uSh").offsetHeight)
     			height = document.getElementById("uSh").offsetHeight;
     		document.getElementById("uSh").style.height = parseInt(height) - padding + "px";
     		document.getElementById("uEl").style.height = parseInt(height) - padding + "px";
     		document.getElementById("uPr").style.height = parseInt(height) - padding + "px";
     	}
     }
      </script>
